arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano provides update on Chelsea and Real Madrid transfer interest in Bundesliga star
arts.sum: RB Leipzig defender Castello Lukeba is set to sign a new contract despite also being on the radar of Chelsea and Real Madrid, according to transfer expert Fabrizio Romano. Lukeba has shone in the Bundesliga and looks like he’d be a fine signing for Chelsea and other top clubs, with the Blues in need of […] The post Fabrizio Romano provides update on Chelsea and Real Madrid transfer interest in Bundesliga star appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Liverpool eye three transfer targets as Alexander-Arnold to be offered huge Real Madrid deal
arts.sum: Real Madrid are planning to offer Liverpool right-back Trent Alexander-Arnold a contract in the range of £14-15million per year extending until the 2029-2030 season, CaughtOffside understands. Sources close to the situation have informed CaughtOffside that, the La Liga giants have been in discussions with Alexander-Arnold’s close circle, and the player is pleased with the proposed […] The post Exclusive: Liverpool eye three transfer targets as Alexander-Arnold to be offered huge Real Madrid deal appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: X reacts to Vinicius Junior masterclass in Champions League win over Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Madrid had shockingly gone into half-time 2-0 down before a flurry of five goals in the final 30 minutes secured a vital three points for Los Blancos. Vinicius Junior was in sublime form for Real Madrid in a dramatic 5-2 win over Borussia Dortmund in the UEFA Champions League on Wednesday evening.

arts.ttl: WATCH: Jude Bellingham Vs Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham played 89 minutes in Real Madrid ’s 5 - 2 win over Borussia Dortmund on Tuesday night at the Bernabeu. As we delve into more and more video content, we’ll also be keeping it in mind to make player comps after games — both Real Madrid at the club level as well as its players on international duty.

arts.ttl: Managing Madrid Podcast: Real Madrid 5 - 2 Borussia Dortmund, Post-game, Champions League 2024 - 2025
arts.sum: On this episode of the Managing Madrid Podcast, Kiyan Sobhani is joined by Graham Hunter directly from the Bernabeu to discuss: Join our Real Madrid Discord Channel: https://discord.gg/rTD2PmE26f

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 5-2 Borussia Dortmund: Player ratings as Vinicius stars in comeback win
arts.sum: Vincius Junior netted a stunning second half hat-trick to secure a dramatic comeback win for Real Madrid over Borussia Dortmund at the Santiago Bernabeu. The goal was scored by centre-back Antonio Rudiger, who rose highest to thump home a Kylian Mbappe cross to get Los Blancos back in the game.
Minutes after Real Madrid fans were singing for Vinicius Jr to win the Ballon d'Or, the Brazil forward insisted he wants to "stay at the club forever".

arts.ttl: Post Match Reaction: Sahin and BVB Toss a Win in the Bin
arts.sum: Sahin could not have made it any simpler for Ancelotti and his squad, and the change in shape not only invited pressure but created confusion between players who needed time to understand when to step and when to wait with the presence of a new defender. Borussia Dortmund are as unpredictable right now as they have ever been, so it only made sense for BVB to enter the Bernabeu and play competitive, competent football which earned them a 2-0 lead going into the half.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid superstar planning lifetime stay at Bernabeu in major boost for Los Blancos
arts.sum: Vinicius Junior says that he wants to stay with Real Madrid "forever" after scoring a hat trick in his side's Champions League success over Borussia Dortmund.
